name: Martian Swarm
description:
Fight off rounds of Martian monsters with your trusty blaster and grenades.

This was a game made in the summer of 2021 to practice game development and adaptive audio via Wwise and to offer it open-source for others.

If you want the Unity project (v. 2020.3.26f1) as well as the Wwise project (v. 2021.1.7.7796) for your own practice - check out this link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1utsqZjDfhuXBIo0RHkX4dEPhtyYi8yEM/view?usp=shari...

Have fun!
